title: PUTSCH. Volume I
description: The annual ISL Tournament is about to begin, but nothing is at it seems...After years of planning they will fight back once more...Manon Aegis has spent many years providing for Crimize, she has out smarted the society's system numerous times. And thanks to her friend Ingra Treharn who resides on the Presivida wall they've become a great team he provides her with extra rations. Her world is turned upside down when she is selected for the ISL tournament. But if she survives will things change for her and her fellow citizens as the residents of ISL prepare for this annual tournament Manon has no choice but to play them at their own game.Unlikely alliances will be made, and may be put to the test but can they survive?
author: Charon Lloyd-Roberts
